00027 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::addMultiBody(btMultiBody* body, int group, int mask)
00028 {
00029         m_multiBodies.push_back(body);

00037 
00038 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::calculateSimulationIslands()
00039 {
00040         BT_PROFILE("calculateSimulationIslands");
00041 
00042         getSimulationIslandManager()->updateActivationState(getCollisionWorld(),getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher());
00043 
00044     {
00045         //merge islands based on speculative contact manifolds too
00046         for (int i=0;i<this->m_predictiveManifolds.size();i++)
00047         {
00048             btPersistentManifold* manifold = m_predictiveManifolds[i];
00049             
00050             const btCollisionObject* colObj0 = manifold->getBody0();
00051             const btCollisionObject* colObj1 = manifold->getBody1();
00052             
00053             if (((colObj0) && (!(colObj0)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())) &&
00054                 ((colObj1) && (!(colObj1)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())))
00055             {
00056                                 getSimulationIslandManager()->getUnionFind().unite((colObj0)->getIslandTag(),(colObj1)->getIslandTag());
00057             }
00058         }
00059     }
00060     
00061         {
00062                 int i;
00063                 int numConstraints = int(m_constraints.size());
00064                 for (i=0;i< numConstraints ; i++ )
00065                 {
00066                         btTypedConstraint* constraint = m_constraints[i];
00067                         if (constraint->isEnabled())
00068                         {
00069                                 const btRigidBody* colObj0 = &constraint->getRigidBodyA();
00070                                 const btRigidBody* colObj1 = &constraint->getRigidBodyB();
00071 
00072                                 if (((colObj0) && (!(colObj0)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())) &&
00073                                         ((colObj1) && (!(colObj1)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())))
00074                                 {
00075                                         getSimulationIslandManager()->getUnionFind().unite((colObj0)->getIslandTag(),(colObj1)->getIslandTag());
00076                                 }
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 
00081         //merge islands linked by Featherstone link colliders
00082         for (int i=0;i<m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00083         {
00084                 btMultiBody* body = m_multiBodies[i];
00085                 {
00086                         btMultiBodyLinkCollider* prev = body->getBaseCollider();
00087 
00088                         for (int b=0;b<body->getNumLinks();b++)
00089                         {
00090                                 btMultiBodyLinkCollider* cur = body->getLink(b).m_collider;
00091                                 
00092                                 if (((cur) && (!(cur)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())) &&
00093                                         ((prev) && (!(prev)->isStaticOrKinematicObject())))
00094                                 {
00095                                         int tagPrev = prev->getIslandTag();
00096                                         int tagCur = cur->getIslandTag();
00097                                         getSimulationIslandManager()->getUnionFind().unite(tagPrev, tagCur);
00098                                 }
00099                                 if (cur && !cur->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
00100                                         prev = cur;
00101                                 
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104         }
00105 
00106         //merge islands linked by multibody constraints
00107         {
00108                 for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodyConstraints.size();i++)
00109                 {
00110                         btMultiBodyConstraint* c = m_multiBodyConstraints[i];
00111                         int tagA = c->getIslandIdA();
00112                         int tagB = c->getIslandIdB();
00113                         if (tagA>=0 && tagB>=0)
00114                                 getSimulationIslandManager()->getUnionFind().unite(tagA, tagB);
00115                 }
00116         }
00117 
00118         //Store the island id in each body
00119         getSimulationIslandManager()->storeIslandActivationState(getCollisionWorld());
00120 
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::updateActivationState(btScalar timeStep)
00125 {
00126         BT_PROFILE("btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::updateActivationState");
00127 
00128         
00129         
00130         for ( int i=0;i<m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00131         {
00132                 btMultiBody* body = m_multiBodies[i];
00133                 if (body)
00134                 {
00135                         body->checkMotionAndSleepIfRequired(timeStep);
00136                         if (!body->isAwake())
00137                         {
00138                                 btMultiBodyLinkCollider* col = body->getBaseCollider();
00139                                 if (col && col->getActivationState() == ACTIVE_TAG)
00140                                 {
00141                                         col->setActivationState( WANTS_DEACTIVATION);
00142                                         col->setDeactivationTime(0.f);
00143                                 }
00144                                 for (int b=0;b<body->getNumLinks();b++)
00145                                 {
00146                                         btMultiBodyLinkCollider* col = body->getLink(b).m_collider;
00147                                         if (col && col->getActivationState() == ACTIVE_TAG)
00148                                         {
00149                                                 col->setActivationState( WANTS_DEACTIVATION);
00150                                                 col->setDeactivationTime(0.f);
00151                                         }
00152                                 }
00153                         } else
00154                         {
00155                                 btMultiBodyLinkCollider* col = body->getBaseCollider();
00156                                 if (col && col->getActivationState() != DISABLE_DEACTIVATION)
00157                                         col->setActivationState( ACTIVE_TAG );
00158 
00159                                 for (int b=0;b<body->getNumLinks();b++)
00160                                 {
00161                                         btMultiBodyLinkCollider* col = body->getLink(b).m_collider;
00162                                         if (col && col->getActivationState() != DISABLE_DEACTIVATION)
00163                                                 col->setActivationState( ACTIVE_TAG );
00164                                 }
00165                         }
00166 
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 
00170         btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::updateActivationState(timeStep);
00171 }

00173 
00174 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btGetConstraintIslandId2(const btTypedConstraint* lhs)
00175 {
00176         int islandId;
00177         
00178         const btCollisionObject& rcolObj0 = lhs->getRigidBodyA();
00179         const btCollisionObject& rcolObj1 = lhs->getRigidBodyB();
00180         islandId= rcolObj0.getIslandTag()>=0?rcolObj0.getIslandTag():rcolObj1.getIslandTag();
00181         return islandId;
00182 
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 class btSortConstraintOnIslandPredicate2
00187 {
00188         public:
00189 
00190                 bool operator() ( const btTypedConstraint* lhs, const btTypedConstraint* rhs ) const
00191                 {
00192                         int rIslandId0,lIslandId0;
00193                         rIslandId0 = btGetConstraintIslandId2(rhs);
00194                         lIslandId0 = btGetConstraintIslandId2(lhs);
00195                         return lIslandId0 < rIslandId0;
00196                 }
00197 };
00198 
00199 
00200 
00201 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btGetMultiBodyConstraintIslandId(const btMultiBodyConstraint* lhs)
00202 {
00203         int islandId;
00204         
00205         int islandTagA = lhs->getIslandIdA();
00206         int islandTagB = lhs->getIslandIdB();
00207         islandId= islandTagA>=0?islandTagA:islandTagB;
00208         return islandId;
00209 
00210 }
00211 
00212 
00213 class btSortMultiBodyConstraintOnIslandPredicate
00214 {
00215         public:
00216 
00217                 bool operator() ( const btMultiBodyConstraint* lhs, const btMultiBodyConstraint* rhs ) const
00218                 {
00219                         int rIslandId0,lIslandId0;
00220                         rIslandId0 = btGetMultiBodyConstraintIslandId(rhs);
00221                         lIslandId0 = btGetMultiBodyConstraintIslandId(lhs);
00222                         return lIslandId0 < rIslandId0;
00223                 }
00224 };

00226 struct MultiBodyInplaceSolverIslandCallback : public btSimulationIslandManager::IslandCallback
00227 {
00228         btContactSolverInfo*    m_solverInfo;
00229         btMultiBodyConstraintSolver*            m_solver;
00230         btMultiBodyConstraint**         m_multiBodySortedConstraints;
00231         int                                                     m_numMultiBodyConstraints;
00232         
00233         btTypedConstraint**             m_sortedConstraints;
00234         int                                             m_numConstraints;
00235         btIDebugDraw*                   m_debugDrawer;
00236         btDispatcher*                   m_dispatcher;
00237         
00238         btAlignedObjectArray<btCollisionObject*> m_bodies;
00239         btAlignedObjectArray<btPersistentManifold*> m_manifolds;
00240         btAlignedObjectArray<btTypedConstraint*> m_constraints;
00241         btAlignedObjectArray<btMultiBodyConstraint*> m_multiBodyConstraints;
00242 
00243 
00244         MultiBodyInplaceSolverIslandCallback(   btMultiBodyConstraintSolver*    solver,
00245                                                                         btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00246                 :m_solverInfo(NULL),
00247                 m_solver(solver),
00248                 m_multiBodySortedConstraints(NULL),
00249                 m_numConstraints(0),
00250                 m_debugDrawer(NULL),
00251                 m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00252         {
00253 
00254         }
00255 
00256         MultiBodyInplaceSolverIslandCallback& operator=(MultiBodyInplaceSolverIslandCallback& other)
00257         {
00258                 btAssert(0);
00259                 (void)other;
00260                 return *this;
00261         }

00263         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setup ( btContactSolverInfo* solverInfo, btTypedConstraint** sortedConstraints, int numConstraints, btMultiBodyConstraint** sortedMultiBodyConstraints,  int     numMultiBodyConstraints,        btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
00264         {
00265                 btAssert(solverInfo);
00266                 m_solverInfo = solverInfo;
00267 
00268                 m_multiBodySortedConstraints = sortedMultiBodyConstraints;
00269                 m_numMultiBodyConstraints = numMultiBodyConstraints;
00270                 m_sortedConstraints = sortedConstraints;
00271                 m_numConstraints = numConstraints;
00272 
00273                 m_debugDrawer = debugDrawer;
00274                 m_bodies.resize (0);
00275                 m_manifolds.resize (0);
00276                 m_constraints.resize (0);
00277                 m_multiBodyConstraints.resize(0);
00278         }
00279 
00280         
00281         virtual void    processIsland(btCollisionObject** bodies,int numBodies,btPersistentManifold**   manifolds,int numManifolds, int islandId)
00282         {
00283                 if (islandId<0)
00284                 {
00286                         m_solver->solveMultiBodyGroup( bodies,numBodies,manifolds, numManifolds,m_sortedConstraints, m_numConstraints, &m_multiBodySortedConstraints[0],m_numConstraints,*m_solverInfo,m_debugDrawer,m_dispatcher);
00287                 } else
00288                 {
00289                                 //also add all non-contact constraints/joints for this island
00290                         btTypedConstraint** startConstraint = 0;
00291                         btMultiBodyConstraint** startMultiBodyConstraint = 0;
00292 
00293                         int numCurConstraints = 0;
00294                         int numCurMultiBodyConstraints = 0;
00295 
00296                         int i;
00297                         
00298                         //find the first constraint for this island
00299 
00300                         for (i=0;i<m_numConstraints;i++)
00301                         {
00302                                 if (btGetConstraintIslandId2(m_sortedConstraints[i]) == islandId)
00303                                 {
00304                                         startConstraint = &m_sortedConstraints[i];
00305                                         break;
00306                                 }
00307                         }
00308                         //count the number of constraints in this island
00309                         for (;i<m_numConstraints;i++)
00310                         {
00311                                 if (btGetConstraintIslandId2(m_sortedConstraints[i]) == islandId)
00312                                 {
00313                                         numCurConstraints++;
00314                                 }
00315                         }
00316 
00317                         for (i=0;i<m_numMultiBodyConstraints;i++)
00318                         {
00319                                 if (btGetMultiBodyConstraintIslandId(m_multiBodySortedConstraints[i]) == islandId)
00320                                 {
00321                                         
00322                                         startMultiBodyConstraint = &m_multiBodySortedConstraints[i];
00323                                         break;
00324                                 }
00325                         }
00326                         //count the number of multi body constraints in this island
00327                         for (;i<m_numMultiBodyConstraints;i++)
00328                         {
00329                                 if (btGetMultiBodyConstraintIslandId(m_multiBodySortedConstraints[i]) == islandId)
00330                                 {
00331                                         numCurMultiBodyConstraints++;
00332                                 }
00333                         }
00334 
00335                         //if (m_solverInfo->m_minimumSolverBatchSize<=1)
00336                         //{
00337                         //      m_solver->solveGroup( bodies,numBodies,manifolds, numManifolds,startConstraint,numCurConstraints,*m_solverInfo,m_debugDrawer,m_dispatcher);
00338                         //} else
00339                         {
00340                                 
00341                                 for (i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00342                                         m_bodies.push_back(bodies[i]);
00343                                 for (i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
00344                                         m_manifolds.push_back(manifolds[i]);
00345                                 for (i=0;i<numCurConstraints;i++)
00346                                         m_constraints.push_back(startConstraint[i]);
00347                                 
00348                                 for (i=0;i<numCurMultiBodyConstraints;i++)
00349                                         m_multiBodyConstraints.push_back(startMultiBodyConstraint[i]);
00350                                 
00351                                 if ((m_constraints.size()+m_manifolds.size())>m_solverInfo->m_minimumSolverBatchSize)
00352                                 {
00353                                         processConstraints();
00354                                 } else
00355                                 {
00356                                         //printf("deferred\n");
00357                                 }
00358                         }
00359                 }
00360         }
00361         void    processConstraints()
00362         {
00363 
00364                 btCollisionObject** bodies = m_bodies.size()? &m_bodies[0]:0;
00365                 btPersistentManifold** manifold = m_manifolds.size()?&m_manifolds[0]:0;
00366                 btTypedConstraint** constraints = m_constraints.size()?&m_constraints[0]:0;
00367                 btMultiBodyConstraint** multiBodyConstraints = m_multiBodyConstraints.size() ? &m_multiBodyConstraints[0] : 0;                  
00368 
00369                 //printf("mb contacts = %d, mb constraints = %d\n", mbContacts, m_multiBodyConstraints.size());
00370         
00371                 m_solver->solveMultiBodyGroup( bodies,m_bodies.size(),manifold, m_manifolds.size(),constraints, m_constraints.size() ,multiBodyConstraints, m_multiBodyConstraints.size(), *m_solverInfo,m_debugDrawer,m_dispatcher);
00372                 m_bodies.resize(0);
00373                 m_manifolds.resize(0);
00374                 m_constraints.resize(0);
00375                 m_multiBodyConstraints.resize(0);
00376         }
00377 
00378 };

00382 btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld(btDispatcher* dispatcher,btBroadphaseInterface* pairCache,btMultiBodyConstraintSolver* constraintSolver,btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration)
00383         :btDiscreteDynamicsWorld(dispatcher,pairCache,constraintSolver,collisionConfiguration),
00384         m_multiBodyConstraintSolver(constraintSolver)
00385 {
00386         //split impulse is not yet supported for Featherstone hierarchies
00387 //      getSolverInfo().m_splitImpulse = false;
00388         getSolverInfo().m_solverMode |=SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS;
00389         m_solverMultiBodyIslandCallback = new MultiBodyInplaceSolverIslandCallback(constraintSolver,dispatcher);
00390 }
00391 
00392 btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::~btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld ()
00393 {
00394         delete m_solverMultiBodyIslandCallback;
00395 }

00397 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::forwardKinematics()
00398 {
00399 
00400         for (int b=0;b<m_multiBodies.size();b++)
00401         {
00402                 btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[b];
00403                 bod->forwardKinematics(m_scratch_world_to_local,m_scratch_local_origin);
00404         }
00405 }
00406 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::solveConstraints(btContactSolverInfo& solverInfo)
00407 {
00408         forwardKinematics();
00409 
00410 
00411 
00412         BT_PROFILE("solveConstraints");
00413         
00414         m_sortedConstraints.resize( m_constraints.size());
00415         int i; 
00416         for (i=0;i<getNumConstraints();i++)
00417         {
00418                 m_sortedConstraints[i] = m_constraints[i];
00419         }
00420         m_sortedConstraints.quickSort(btSortConstraintOnIslandPredicate2());
00421         btTypedConstraint** constraintsPtr = getNumConstraints() ? &m_sortedConstraints[0] : 0;
00422 
00423         m_sortedMultiBodyConstraints.resize(m_multiBodyConstraints.size());
00424         for (i=0;i<m_multiBodyConstraints.size();i++)
00425         {
00426                 m_sortedMultiBodyConstraints[i] = m_multiBodyConstraints[i];
00427         }
00428         m_sortedMultiBodyConstraints.quickSort(btSortMultiBodyConstraintOnIslandPredicate());
00429 
00430         btMultiBodyConstraint** sortedMultiBodyConstraints = m_sortedMultiBodyConstraints.size() ?  &m_sortedMultiBodyConstraints[0] : 0;
00431         
00432 
00433         m_solverMultiBodyIslandCallback->setup(&solverInfo,constraintsPtr,m_sortedConstraints.size(),sortedMultiBodyConstraints,m_sortedMultiBodyConstraints.size(), getDebugDrawer());
00434         m_constraintSolver->prepareSolve(getCollisionWorld()->getNumCollisionObjects(), getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher()->getNumManifolds());
00435         
00437         m_islandManager->buildAndProcessIslands(getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher(),getCollisionWorld(),m_solverMultiBodyIslandCallback);
00438 
00439 #ifndef BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00440         {
00441                 BT_PROFILE("btMultiBody addForce");
00442                 for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00443                 {
00444                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00445 
00446                         bool isSleeping = false;
00447                         
00448                         if (bod->getBaseCollider() && bod->getBaseCollider()->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00449                         {
00450                                 isSleeping = true;
00451                         } 
00452                         for (int b=0;b<bod->getNumLinks();b++)
00453                         {
00454                                 if (bod->getLink(b).m_collider && bod->getLink(b).m_collider->getActivationState()==ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00455                                         isSleeping = true;
00456                         } 
00457 
00458                         if (!isSleeping)
00459                         {
00460                                 //useless? they get resized in stepVelocities once again (AND DIFFERENTLY)
00461                                 m_scratch_r.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);                       //multidof? ("Y"s use it and it is used to store qdd)
00462                                 m_scratch_v.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);
00463                                 m_scratch_m.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);
00464 
00465                                 bod->addBaseForce(m_gravity * bod->getBaseMass());
00466 
00467                                 for (int j = 0; j < bod->getNumLinks(); ++j) 
00468                                 {
00469                                         bod->addLinkForce(j, m_gravity * bod->getLinkMass(j));
00470                                 }
00471                         }//if (!isSleeping)
00472                 }
00473         }
00474 #endif //BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00475         
00476 
00477         {
00478                 BT_PROFILE("btMultiBody stepVelocities");
00479                 for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00480                 {
00481                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00482 
00483                         bool isSleeping = false;
00484                         
00485                         if (bod->getBaseCollider() && bod->getBaseCollider()->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00486                         {
00487                                 isSleeping = true;
00488                         } 
00489                         for (int b=0;b<bod->getNumLinks();b++)
00490                         {
00491                                 if (bod->getLink(b).m_collider && bod->getLink(b).m_collider->getActivationState()==ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00492                                         isSleeping = true;
00493                         } 
00494 
00495                         if (!isSleeping)
00496                         {
00497                                 //useless? they get resized in stepVelocities once again (AND DIFFERENTLY)
00498                                 m_scratch_r.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);                       //multidof? ("Y"s use it and it is used to store qdd)
00499                                 m_scratch_v.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);
00500                                 m_scratch_m.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);
00501                                 bool doNotUpdatePos = false;
00502 
00503                                 {
00504                                         if(!bod->isUsingRK4Integration())
00505                                         {
00506                                                 bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(solverInfo.m_timeStep, m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m);
00507                                         }
00508                                         else
00509                                         {                                               
00510                                                 //
00511                                                 int numDofs = bod->getNumDofs() + 6;
00512                                                 int numPosVars = bod->getNumPosVars() + 7;
00513                                                 btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar> scratch_r2; scratch_r2.resize(2*numPosVars + 8*numDofs);
00514                                                 //convenience
00515                                                 btScalar *pMem = &scratch_r2[0];
00516                                                 btScalar *scratch_q0 = pMem; pMem += numPosVars;
00517                                                 btScalar *scratch_qx = pMem; pMem += numPosVars;
00518                                                 btScalar *scratch_qd0 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00519                                                 btScalar *scratch_qd1 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00520                                                 btScalar *scratch_qd2 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00521                                                 btScalar *scratch_qd3 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00522                                                 btScalar *scratch_qdd0 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00523                                                 btScalar *scratch_qdd1 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00524                                                 btScalar *scratch_qdd2 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00525                                                 btScalar *scratch_qdd3 = pMem; pMem += numDofs;
00526                                                 btAssert((pMem - (2*numPosVars + 8*numDofs)) == &scratch_r2[0]);
00527 
00529                                                 //copy q0 to scratch_q0 and qd0 to scratch_qd0
00530                                                 scratch_q0[0] = bod->getWorldToBaseRot().x();
00531                                                 scratch_q0[1] = bod->getWorldToBaseRot().y();
00532                                                 scratch_q0[2] = bod->getWorldToBaseRot().z();
00533                                                 scratch_q0[3] = bod->getWorldToBaseRot().w();
00534                                                 scratch_q0[4] = bod->getBasePos().x();
00535                                                 scratch_q0[5] = bod->getBasePos().y();
00536                                                 scratch_q0[6] = bod->getBasePos().z();
00537                                                 //
00538                                                 for(int link = 0; link < bod->getNumLinks(); ++link)
00539                                                 {
00540                                                         for(int dof = 0; dof < bod->getLink(link).m_posVarCount; ++dof)
00541                                                                 scratch_q0[7 + bod->getLink(link).m_cfgOffset + dof] = bod->getLink(link).m_jointPos[dof];                                                      
00542                                                 }
00543                                                 //
00544                                                 for(int dof = 0; dof < numDofs; ++dof)                                                          
00545                                                         scratch_qd0[dof] = bod->getVelocityVector()[dof];
00547                                                 struct
00548                                                 {
00549                                                     btMultiBody *bod;
00550                             btScalar *scratch_qx, *scratch_q0;
00551 
00552                                                     void operator()()
00553                                                     {
00554                                                         for(int dof = 0; dof < bod->getNumPosVars() + 7; ++dof)
00555                                     scratch_qx[dof] = scratch_q0[dof];
00556                                                     }
00557                                                 } pResetQx = {bod, scratch_qx, scratch_q0};
00558                                                 //
00559                                                 struct
00560                                                 {
00561                                                     void operator()(btScalar dt, const btScalar *pDer, const btScalar *pCurVal, btScalar *pVal, int size)
00562                                                     {
00563                                                         for(int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00564                                     pVal[i] = pCurVal[i] + dt * pDer[i];
00565                                                     }
00566 
00567                                                 } pEulerIntegrate;
00568                                                 //
00569                                                 struct
00570                         {
00571                             void operator()(btMultiBody *pBody, const btScalar *pData)
00572                             {
00573                                 btScalar *pVel = const_cast<btScalar*>(pBody->getVelocityVector());
00574 
00575                                 for(int i = 0; i < pBody->getNumDofs() + 6; ++i)
00576                                     pVel[i] = pData[i];
00577 
00578                             }
00579                         } pCopyToVelocityVector;
00580                                                 //
00581                         struct
00582                                                 {
00583                                                     void operator()(const btScalar *pSrc, btScalar *pDst, int start, int size)
00584                                                     {
00585                                                         for(int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00586                                     pDst[i] = pSrc[start + i];
00587                                                     }
00588                                                 } pCopy;
00589                                                 //
00590 
00591                                                 btScalar h = solverInfo.m_timeStep;
00592                                                 #define output &m_scratch_r[bod->getNumDofs()]
00593                                                 //calc qdd0 from: q0 & qd0      
00594                                                 bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(0., m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m);
00595                                                 pCopy(output, scratch_qdd0, 0, numDofs);
00596                                                 //calc q1 = q0 + h/2 * qd0
00597                                                 pResetQx();
00598                                                 bod->stepPositionsMultiDof(btScalar(.5)*h, scratch_qx, scratch_qd0);
00599                                                 //calc qd1 = qd0 + h/2 * qdd0
00600                                                 pEulerIntegrate(btScalar(.5)*h, scratch_qdd0, scratch_qd0, scratch_qd1, numDofs);
00601                                                 //
00602                                                 //calc qdd1 from: q1 & qd1
00603                                                 pCopyToVelocityVector(bod, scratch_qd1);
00604                                                 bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(0., m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m);
00605                                                 pCopy(output, scratch_qdd1, 0, numDofs);
00606                                                 //calc q2 = q0 + h/2 * qd1
00607                                                 pResetQx();
00608                                                 bod->stepPositionsMultiDof(btScalar(.5)*h, scratch_qx, scratch_qd1);
00609                                                 //calc qd2 = qd0 + h/2 * qdd1
00610                                                 pEulerIntegrate(btScalar(.5)*h, scratch_qdd1, scratch_qd0, scratch_qd2, numDofs);
00611                                                 //
00612                                                 //calc qdd2 from: q2 & qd2
00613                                                 pCopyToVelocityVector(bod, scratch_qd2);
00614                                                 bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(0., m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m);
00615                                                 pCopy(output, scratch_qdd2, 0, numDofs);
00616                                                 //calc q3 = q0 + h * qd2
00617                                                 pResetQx();
00618                                                 bod->stepPositionsMultiDof(h, scratch_qx, scratch_qd2);
00619                                                 //calc qd3 = qd0 + h * qdd2
00620                                                 pEulerIntegrate(h, scratch_qdd2, scratch_qd0, scratch_qd3, numDofs);
00621                                                 //
00622                                                 //calc qdd3 from: q3 & qd3
00623                                                 pCopyToVelocityVector(bod, scratch_qd3);
00624                                                 bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(0., m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m);
00625                                                 pCopy(output, scratch_qdd3, 0, numDofs);
00626 
00627                                                 //
00628                                                 //calc q = q0 + h/6(qd0 + 2*(qd1 + qd2) + qd3)
00629                                                 //calc qd = qd0 + h/6(qdd0 + 2*(qdd1 + qdd2) + qdd3)                                            
00630                                                 btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar> delta_q; delta_q.resize(numDofs);
00631                                                 btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar> delta_qd; delta_qd.resize(numDofs);
00632                                                 for(int i = 0; i < numDofs; ++i)
00633                                                 {
00634                                                         delta_q[i] = h/btScalar(6.)*(scratch_qd0[i] + 2*scratch_qd1[i] + 2*scratch_qd2[i] + scratch_qd3[i]);
00635                                                         delta_qd[i] = h/btScalar(6.)*(scratch_qdd0[i] + 2*scratch_qdd1[i] + 2*scratch_qdd2[i] + scratch_qdd3[i]);                                                       
00636                                                         //delta_q[i] = h*scratch_qd0[i];
00637                                                         //delta_qd[i] = h*scratch_qdd0[i];
00638                                                 }
00639                                                 //
00640                                                 pCopyToVelocityVector(bod, scratch_qd0);
00641                                                 bod->applyDeltaVeeMultiDof(&delta_qd[0], 1);                                            
00642                                                 //
00643                                                 if(!doNotUpdatePos)
00644                                                 {
00645                                                         btScalar *pRealBuf = const_cast<btScalar *>(bod->getVelocityVector());
00646                                                         pRealBuf += 6 + bod->getNumDofs() + bod->getNumDofs()*bod->getNumDofs();
00647 
00648                                                         for(int i = 0; i < numDofs; ++i)
00649                                                                 pRealBuf[i] = delta_q[i];
00650 
00651                                                         //bod->stepPositionsMultiDof(1, 0, &delta_q[0]);
00652                                                         bod->setPosUpdated(true);                                                       
00653                                                 }
00654 
00655                                                 //ugly hack which resets the cached data to t0 (needed for constraint solver)
00656                                                 {
00657                                                         for(int link = 0; link < bod->getNumLinks(); ++link)
00658                                                                 bod->getLink(link).updateCacheMultiDof();
00659                                                         bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(0, m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m);
00660                                                 }
00661                                                 
00662                                         }
00663                                 }
00664                                 
00665 #ifndef BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00666                                 bod->clearForcesAndTorques();
00667 #endif //BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00668                         }//if (!isSleeping)
00669                 }
00670         }
00671 
00672         clearMultiBodyConstraintForces();
00673 
00674         m_solverMultiBodyIslandCallback->processConstraints();
00675         
00676         m_constraintSolver->allSolved(solverInfo, m_debugDrawer);
00677 
00678         {
00679                 BT_PROFILE("btMultiBody stepVelocities");
00680                 for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00681                 {
00682                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00683 
00684                         bool isSleeping = false;
00685 
00686                         if (bod->getBaseCollider() && bod->getBaseCollider()->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00687                         {
00688                                 isSleeping = true;
00689                         }
00690                         for (int b=0;b<bod->getNumLinks();b++)
00691                         {
00692                                 if (bod->getLink(b).m_collider && bod->getLink(b).m_collider->getActivationState()==ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00693                                         isSleeping = true;
00694                         }
00695 
00696                         if (!isSleeping)
00697                         {
00698                                 //useless? they get resized in stepVelocities once again (AND DIFFERENTLY)
00699                                 m_scratch_r.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);                 //multidof? ("Y"s use it and it is used to store qdd)
00700                                 m_scratch_v.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);
00701                                 m_scratch_m.resize(bod->getNumLinks()+1);
00702 
00703                                 
00704                             {
00705                                 if(!bod->isUsingRK4Integration())
00706                                 {
00707                                                                         bool isConstraintPass = true;
00708                                     bod->computeAccelerationsArticulatedBodyAlgorithmMultiDof(solverInfo.m_timeStep, m_scratch_r, m_scratch_v, m_scratch_m, isConstraintPass);
00709                                 }
00710                                 }
00711                         }
00712                 }
00713         }
00714 
00715         for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00716         {
00717                 btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00718                 bod->processDeltaVeeMultiDof2();
00719         }
00720 
00721 }
00722 
00723 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::integrateTransforms(btScalar timeStep)
00724 {
00725         btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::integrateTransforms(timeStep);
00726 
00727         {
00728                 BT_PROFILE("btMultiBody stepPositions");
00729                 //integrate and update the Featherstone hierarchies
00730         
00731                 for (int b=0;b<m_multiBodies.size();b++)
00732                 {
00733                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[b];
00734                         bool isSleeping = false;
00735                         if (bod->getBaseCollider() && bod->getBaseCollider()->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00736                         {
00737                                 isSleeping = true;
00738                         } 
00739                         for (int b=0;b<bod->getNumLinks();b++)
00740                         {
00741                                 if (bod->getLink(b).m_collider && bod->getLink(b).m_collider->getActivationState()==ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00742                                         isSleeping = true;
00743                         }
00744 
00745 
00746                         if (!isSleeping)
00747                         {
00748                                 int nLinks = bod->getNumLinks();
00749 
00751                         
00752                                 
00753                                 {
00754                                         if(!bod->isPosUpdated())
00755                                                 bod->stepPositionsMultiDof(timeStep);
00756                                         else
00757                                         {
00758                                                 btScalar *pRealBuf = const_cast<btScalar *>(bod->getVelocityVector());
00759                                                 pRealBuf += 6 + bod->getNumDofs() + bod->getNumDofs()*bod->getNumDofs();
00760 
00761                                                 bod->stepPositionsMultiDof(1, 0, pRealBuf);
00762                                                 bod->setPosUpdated(false);
00763                                         }
00764                                 }
00765                                 
00766                                 m_scratch_world_to_local.resize(nLinks+1);
00767                                 m_scratch_local_origin.resize(nLinks+1);
00768 
00769                                 bod->updateCollisionObjectWorldTransforms(m_scratch_world_to_local,m_scratch_local_origin);
00770                                 
00771                         } else
00772                         {
00773                                 bod->clearVelocities();
00774                         }
00775                 }
00776         }
00777 }

00797 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::debugDrawWorld()
00798 {
00799         BT_PROFILE("btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld debugDrawWorld");
00800 
00801         btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::debugDrawWorld();
00802 
00803         bool drawConstraints = false;
00804         if (getDebugDrawer())
00805         {
00806                 int mode = getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode();
00807                 if (mode  & (btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraints | btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawConstraintLimits))
00808                 {
00809                         drawConstraints = true;
00810                 }
00811 
00812                 if (drawConstraints)
00813                 {
00814                         BT_PROFILE("btMultiBody debugDrawWorld");
00815                         
00816 
00817                         for (int c=0;c<m_multiBodyConstraints.size();c++)
00818                         {
00819                                 btMultiBodyConstraint* constraint = m_multiBodyConstraints[c];
00820                                 debugDrawMultiBodyConstraint(constraint);
00821                         }
00822 
00823                         for (int b = 0; b<m_multiBodies.size(); b++)
00824                         {
00825                                 btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[b];
00826                                 bod->forwardKinematics(m_scratch_world_to_local1,m_scratch_local_origin1);
00827                                 
00828                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(bod->getBaseWorldTransform(), 0.1);
00829 
00830 
00831                                 for (int m = 0; m<bod->getNumLinks(); m++)
00832                                 {
00833                                         
00834                                         const btTransform& tr = bod->getLink(m).m_cachedWorldTransform;
00835 
00836                                         getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(tr, 0.1);
00837 
00838                                                 //draw the joint axis
00839                                         if (bod->getLink(m).m_jointType==btMultibodyLink::eRevolute)
00840                                         {
00841                                                 btVector3 vec = quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_axes[0].m_topVec);
00842                                         
00843                                                 btVector4 color(0,0,0,1);//1,1,1);
00844                                                 btVector3 from = vec+tr.getOrigin()-quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_dVector);
00845                                                 btVector3 to = tr.getOrigin()-quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_dVector);
00846                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(from,to,color);
00847                                         }
00848                                         if (bod->getLink(m).m_jointType==btMultibodyLink::eFixed)
00849                                         {
00850                                                 btVector3 vec = quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_axes[0].m_bottomVec);
00851                                         
00852                                                 btVector4 color(0,0,0,1);//1,1,1);
00853                                                 btVector3 from = vec+tr.getOrigin()-quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_dVector);
00854                                                 btVector3 to = tr.getOrigin()-quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_dVector);
00855                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(from,to,color);
00856                                         }
00857                                         if (bod->getLink(m).m_jointType==btMultibodyLink::ePrismatic)
00858                                         {
00859                                                 btVector3 vec = quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_axes[0].m_bottomVec);
00860                                         
00861                                                 btVector4 color(0,0,0,1);//1,1,1);
00862                                                 btVector3 from = vec+tr.getOrigin()-quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_dVector);
00863                                                 btVector3 to = tr.getOrigin()-quatRotate(tr.getRotation(),bod->getLink(m).m_dVector);
00864                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(from,to,color);
00865                                         }
00866                                         
00867                                 }
00868                         }
00869                 }
00870         }
00871 
00872

00876 
00877 void btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::applyGravity()
00878 {
00879         btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::applyGravity();
00880 #ifdef BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00881         BT_PROFILE("btMultiBody addGravity");
00882         for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00883         {
00884                 btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00885 
00886                 bool isSleeping = false;
00887 
00888                 if (bod->getBaseCollider() && bod->getBaseCollider()->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00889                 {
00890                         isSleeping = true;
00891                 }
00892                 for (int b=0;b<bod->getNumLinks();b++)
00893                 {
00894                         if (bod->getLink(b).m_collider && bod->getLink(b).m_collider->getActivationState()==ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00895                                 isSleeping = true;
00896                 }
00897 
00898                 if (!isSleeping)
00899                 {
00900                         bod->addBaseForce(m_gravity * bod->getBaseMass());
00901 
00902                         for (int j = 0; j < bod->getNumLinks(); ++j)
00903                         {
00904                                 bod->addLinkForce(j, m_gravity * bod->getLinkMass(j));
00905                         }
00906                 }//if (!isSleeping)
00907         }
00908 #endif //BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00909 }
00910 
00911 void btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::clearMultiBodyConstraintForces()
00912 { 
00913   for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00914                 {       
00915                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00916                         bod->clearConstraintForces();
00917                   } 
00918 }
00919 void btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::clearMultiBodyForces()
00920 {
00921               {
00922                // BT_PROFILE("clearMultiBodyForces");
00923                 for (int i=0;i<this->m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00924                 {
00925                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00926 
00927                         bool isSleeping = false;
00928 
00929                         if (bod->getBaseCollider() && bod->getBaseCollider()->getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00930                         {       
00931                                 isSleeping = true;
00932                         }
00933                         for (int b=0;b<bod->getNumLinks();b++)
00934                         {       
00935                                 if (bod->getLink(b).m_collider && bod->getLink(b).m_collider->getActivationState()==ISLAND_SLEEPING)     
00936                                         isSleeping = true;
00937                         }
00938 
00939                         if (!isSleeping)
00940                         {
00941                         btMultiBody* bod = m_multiBodies[i];
00942                         bod->clearForcesAndTorques();
00943                         }
00944                 }
00945         }
00946 
00947 }
00948 void btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::clearForces()
00949 {
00950         btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::clearForces();
00951 
00952 #ifdef BT_USE_VIRTUAL_CLEARFORCES_AND_GRAVITY
00953         clearMultiBodyForces();
00954 #endif
00955 }

00960 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::serialize(btSerializer* serializer)
00961 {
00962 
00963         serializer->startSerialization();
00964 
00965         serializeDynamicsWorldInfo( serializer);
00966 
00967         serializeMultiBodies(serializer);
00968 
00969         serializeRigidBodies(serializer);
00970 
00971         serializeCollisionObjects(serializer);
00972 
00973         serializer->finishSerialization();
00974 }
00975 
00976 void    btMultiBodyDynamicsWorld::serializeMultiBodies(btSerializer* serializer)
00977 {
00978         int i;
00979         //serialize all collision objects
00980         for (i=0;i<m_multiBodies.size();i++)
00981         {
00982                 btMultiBody* mb = m_multiBodies[i];
00983                 {
00984                         int len = mb->calculateSerializeBufferSize();
00985                         btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(len,1);
00986                         const char* structType = mb->serialize(chunk->m_oldPtr, serializer);
00987                         serializer->finalizeChunk(chunk,structType,BT_MULTIBODY_CODE,mb);
00988                 }
00989         }
00990
